dataset_id: BOREAS RSS-19 1994 CASI At-Sensor Radiance and Reflectance Images
title: BOREAS RSS-19 1994 CASI At-Sensor Radiance and Reflectance Images
summary: CASI images from the Chieftain Navaho aircraft taken in order to observe the seasonal change in the radiometric reflectance properties of the boreal forest landscape. CASI data include the following: 1) canopy bidirectional reflectance,2) canopy biochemistry, 3) spatial variability, and 4) estimates of up and downwelling PAR and spectral albedo.

citation: Zagolski, F., N.T. O'Neill, A. Royer, and J.R. Miller. 1999. Validation of a DDV-based aerosol optical depth retrieval algorithm using multialtitude spectral imagery. Journal of Geophysical Research: Atmospheres. 104(D22):27959-27971.
